address2: 5th Floor No. 2570 Hechuan Road Minhang District
longBusinessSummary: Xiao-I Corporation, through its subsidiary, Shanghai Xiao-i Robot Technology Co., Ltd., provides software services in the People's Republic of China. The company offers a conversational AI platform that uses deep learning, data enhancement, and active learning technologies for dialog management and context processing mechanisms, driven by a learning system. It also provides a knowledge fusion platform that integrates Q&A, documents, multimedia, information forms, business processes, knowledge graphs, and multimodal intelligence. The voice platform enhances intelligent speech solutions, realizing the macro processes of intelligent IVP, intelligent outbound calls, speech analysis, agent assistance, and human-computer interaction. Additionally, the hyperautomation platform integrates technologies such as OCR, NLP, and visualized data mining and analysis, enabling users to achieve business and process automation. The company also offers a data intelligence platform that integrates data assets and manages the entire life cycle of data, realizing the full cycle of data integration, processing, transformation, analysis, and mining. Its cloud platform integrates NLP, speech recognition, image recognition, and data analysis capabilities. The intelligent construction support platform provides parsing, reconstruction, visualization, and multidimensional analysis of construction drawings. Furthermore, it offers a vision analysis platform that uses various computer vision-related technologies for OCR, detection, video, and image analysis. The intelligent hardware support platform provides a framework for signal collection, processing, analysis, prediction, and more. Lastly, the metaverse platform develops virtual digital humans. Xiao-I Corporation serves its products to large and medium-sized contact centers, financial institutions, communication operators, government services, industrial manufacturing, medical care, and other sectors. The company was incorporated in 2018 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
